Description.Name: BULWARK
Description.Details: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction. The Mech is +1 easier to hit while using Bulwark.
